revised_title: Experimental Researches on Diamagnetic and Magnetic Phenomena in Gases
tldr: Faraday investigates the magnetic and diamagnetic properties of various gases, including oxygen, nitrogen, and hydrogen, and finds that they do not expand or contract significantly when exposed to a magnetic field. He also examines the effects of magnetic fields on the refraction of light, but does not observe any changes in the course of the light rays.
